awd_titl_txt: Natural Hazards Research and Applications Information Center
awd_abstract_narration: This award provides renewed support                                             for the Natural Hazards Research                                                and Applications Information Center                                             at the University of Colorado in                                                Boulder.  The Center monitors and                                               disseminates hazards research                                                   information to multiple                                                         users--administrators,                                                          practitioners, policy makers,                                                   scientists and engineers.  The                                                  Center publishes and distributes                                                the NATURAL HAZARDS OBSERVER to                                                 over 10,000 subscribers six times a                                             year; operates an electronic                                                    newsletter, DISASTER RESEARCH ; and                                             publishes monographs, working                                                   papers, bibliographies and special                                              publications.  It holds an annual                                               workshop involving users and                                                    producers of hazards research, and                                              it provides information on a day-                                               to-day basis in response to                                                     inquiries.  The Center conducts                                                 modest research activities relating                                             to societal response to natural                                                 hazards and supports researchers                                                throughout the nation as they carry                                             out "quick response" studies of                                                 specific hazard events.  Inaddition                                             to NSF, several other agencies are                                              also supporting this activity.
org_div_long_name: Division of Civil, Mechanical, and Manufacturing Innovation
